roleset.name: transfer of goods, acquire

example.name: get-v: simple transitive
example.text: Could I get a one - way ticket from Milwaukee to Orlando ?

propbank.arg: a one - way ticket from Milwaukee to Orlando

example.name: get-v: with price
example.text: They get something equally good for less .

example.name: get-v: with source
example.text: The march got its support from self - serving groups .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG4
example.text: I am not trying to get honor for myself .

example.name: get-v: price as subject
example.text: $ 15 gets you a lot of daisies .

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: Based on big corpus. Member of VNcls get-13.5.1-1. (from get.01-v)

roleset.name: have-got: already possess

example.name: get-v: always with have auxiliary?
example.text: You 've got two champions sitting right before you .

propbank.arg: two champions sitting right before you

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from get.02-v)

roleset.name: become

role.descr: attribute of arg1 (not a VP node)

example.name: get-v: basic becoming
example.text: That got hard to take .

example.name: get-v: it support
example.text: It 's getting harder to sell .

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: Member of VNcls convert-26.6.2. (from get.03-v)
If the rel is followed by a VP node, it's really an auxilliary-- which is roleset get.24! (from get.03-v)

roleset.name: cause to do or be something

role.descr: a clause -- action done or descriptive small clause

example.name: get-v: become with agent
example.text: They got us thinking , " maybe we could be doing PAS tagging ! "

propbank.arg: us thinking , " maybe we could be doing PAS tagging ! "

example.name: get-v: cause
example.text: They get big studios to bankroll and distribute the films .

propbank.arg: big studios to bankroll and distribute the films

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: Member of VNcls convert-26.6.2. (from get.04-v)

roleset.name: move

example.name: get-v: metaphorical motion
example.text: Financing problems caused a nine - month delay in *trace* getting the product to market .

example.name: get-v: destination and source all at once
example.text: Getting to and from the airport in coming weeks may be theproblem , however .

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: metaphorical extension of convert-26.6.2. (from get.05-v)

roleset.name: must

example.name: get-v: get as must
example.text: We 've got to take a serious look at how we 're doing our jobs .

propbank.arg: to take a serious look at how we 're doing our jobs

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: (from get.06-v)

roleset.name: have the pleasure of doing something, "i gettuh..."

example.name: get-v: All arguments
example.text: `` The oldest designer got to work on the dashboard , '' she recalls .

roleset.name: auxiliary usage (rel followed by a vp)

example.name: get-v: standard
example.text: John and Mary got married .

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: No VNcls. Do not tag, except for rel! (from get.24-v)
rel is followed by a VP node. (from get.24-v)

roleset.name: get to: aggravate, annoy

example.name: get-v
example.text: My back really gets to me when it rains .

roleset.note: GET-V NOTES: Added by Julia, Meredith for Google.

roleset.name: understand, grasp conceptually

role.descr: source of understood thing, perhaps another communicator

example.name: get-v
example.text: Oh , I get you now .

example.name: get-v
example.text: I do n't get why my second loop is n't pushing values

propbank.arg: why my second loop is n't pushing values

example.name: get-v
example.text: I do n't get women .

example.name: get-v
example.text: Yeah that 's not what I got from his comment at all . I think there was a misunderstanding

roleset.note: GET-V, GET-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.
Here, women are a topic, not a source of topic. They are most definitely not possessions, which is why this is not a good sense to conflate with .01.

roleset.name: produce

example.name: get_out-v: become?
example.text: The company is certain to get out some aircraft with just supervisors and other non - striking employees on hand .

propbank.arg: with just supervisors and other non - striking employees on hand

roleset.note: GET_OUT-V NOTES: No appropriate VNcls or FN. Checked by Julia, 12/2010. (from get.07-v)

roleset.name: manage to accomplish without repercussions

example.name: get_away-v: manage
example.text: Buyers may not get away with some of the things they 've done in the past .

propbank.arg: with some of the things they 've done in the past

Always "get away with"? (from get.08-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: There were women who lost loved ones but got them back when they were raised from death .

example.name: get_back-v: back to normal
example.text: UAL trading would get back to normal .

roleset.name: get even: revenge

example.name: all args
example.text: Oh please you never wondered how to get back at the police for writing you a speeding ticket

roleset.note: GET_BACK-V NOTES: frame added by Arrick. No VNcls. (from get.19-v)

example.name: get_back-v: args 0, 1
example.text: Hey girl , so for some reason the girl I was supposed to stay with is nt picking up her phone , are you still free to host justin case she does nt get back to me ?

example.text: A new $ 46 million steel rod minimill got off to a rocky start in early 1988 .

roleset.note: GET_OFF-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from get.11-v)

roleset.name: get away with something

example.name: get_off-v: Colloquial usage, no arg0
example.text: Where does Mr. Lehman get off castigating Gen. George Marshall for muscling in on naval prerogatives ?

propbank.arg: castigating Gen. George Marshall for muscling in on naval prerogatives

example.name: get_off-v: Less colloquial, same sense
example.text: And her dad was the lawyer who got OJ Simpson off for murder of his ex wife .

propbank.arg: for murder of his ex wife

roleset.note: GET_OFF-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj revisions, comparison to get.08: get away with... Framed by Claire. No VNcls.(from get.23-v)

roleset.name: reach a state of euphoria, climax (via drugs, sex, or random happy things)

example.name: get_off-v
example.text: I get off on ' 57 Chevies

example.name: get_off-v: with arg0
example.text: I 've always been able to get him off with my mouth , thankfully .

example.name: get_off-v
example.text: I know Chubbs was getting off on Christmas tree decorating this morning but I got a serious problem regarding " The Tree " .

example.name: get_off-v
example.text: It has a lot of metaphysical books and I was getting off on Orthodox spirituality at the time - the Philokalia and the sayings of the Fathers .

propbank.arg: the Philokalia and the sayings of the Fathers

roleset.note: GET_OFF-V NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.text: Two years ago there was trouble with people getting through on the phone .

example.text: `` It 's hard to imagine how the markets were speculating , given that nobody could get through to San Francisco , '' said one amazed oil company executive .

example.text: Mr. Guber got together with Mr. Peters .

roleset.name: have good relations

example.name: get_on-v
example.text: His mother and father did not get on well together .

example.name: get_on-v: The business of life
example.text: Jerry can get on with the business of building a life for himself .

roleset.note: GET_ON-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from get.21-v)

roleset.name: arise from slumber

example.name: get_up-v: args 1, 2
example.text: Yes coffee ! ! ! Afternoon ? I hate having to get up at a time on Sunday !

roleset.note: GET_UP-v NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS02.
For THYME annotation: use this roleset for all instances of 'get up' including a simple change of position that does not involve having been in bed or asleep.
